00043     template <class ApiFunc>
00044       int run(ApiFunc function, std::string dietConfig, int ac, char*  av[]) {
00045 
00046         try{
00047 
00048           // initializing DIET
00049 
00050           if (vishnuInitialize(const_cast<char*>(dietConfig.c_str()), ac, av)) {
00051 
00052             errorUsage(av[0],dietErrorMsg,EXECERROR);
00053 
00054             return  CLI_ERROR_DIET ;
00055           }
00056 
00057           // get the sessionKey
00058           std::string sessionKey=getLastSessionKey(getppid());
00059 
00060           // DIET call 
00061           if(false==sessionKey.empty()){
00062             printSessionKeyMessage();
00063             //call of the api fuction
00064             function(sessionKey);
00065 
00066             printSuccessMessage(); 
00067 
00068           }
00069         } catch(VishnuException& e){// catch all Vishnu runtime error
00070           std::string  msg = e.getMsg()+" ["+e.getMsgComp()+"]";
00071           errorUsage(av[0], msg,EXECERROR);
00072           //check the bad session key
00073           if (checkBadSessionKeyError(e)){
00074             removeBadSessionKeyFromFile(getppid());
00075           }
00076           return e.getMsgI() ;
00077         } catch(std::exception& e){// catch all std runtime error
00078           errorUsage(av[0],e.what());
00079           return CLI_ERROR_RUNTIME;
00080         }
00081 
00082       }
00083 
00095     template <class ApiFunc>
00096       int runWithoutSessionKey(ApiFunc function, std::string dietConfig, int ac, char*  av[]) {
00097 
00098         try{
00099 
00100           // initializing DIET
00101 
00102           if (vishnuInitialize(const_cast<char*>(dietConfig.c_str()), ac, av)) {
00103 
00104             errorUsage(av[0],dietErrorMsg,EXECERROR);
00105 
00106             return  CLI_ERROR_DIET ;
00107           }
00108 
00109           //call of the api fuction
00110           function();
00111 
00112           printSuccessMessage(); 
00113 
00114         } catch(VishnuException& e){// catch all Vishnu runtime error
00115           std::string  msg = e.getMsg()+" ["+e.getMsgComp()+"]";
00116           errorUsage(av[0], msg,EXECERROR);
00117           return e.getMsgI() ;
00118         } catch(std::exception& e){// catch all std runtime error
00119           errorUsage(av[0],e.what());
00120           return CLI_ERROR_RUNTIME;
00121         }
00122 
00123       }

00134     void processListOpt(const boost::shared_ptr<Options>& opt, bool& isEmpty, int ac, char*  av[], 
00135         const std::string& signature=std::string()) {
00136 
00137       CLICmd cmd = CLICmd (ac, av, opt);
00138       try {
00139         opt->parse_cli(ac,av);
00140 
00141         isEmpty=opt->empty();//if no value was given in the command line
00142         // Parse the cli and setting the options found
00143         int ret = cmd.parse(env_name_mapper());
00144 
00145         if (ret != CLI_SUCCESS){
00146           helpUsage(*opt,"[option] "+signature);
00147           exit(ret);
00148         }
00149 
00150         // PreProcess (adapt some parameters if necessary)
00151         checkVishnuConfig(*opt);
00152         if ( opt->count("help")){
00153           helpUsage(*opt,"[option] "+signature);
00154           exit(0);
00155         }
00156 
00157       }
00158       catch(po::error& e){ // catch all other bad parameter errors
00159         helpUsage(*opt,"[option] "+signature);
00160         exit(CLI_ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER);
00161       }
00162       catch(std::exception& e){// catch all std runtime error
00163         errorUsage(av[0],e.what());
00164         exit(CLI_ERROR_INVALID_PARAMETER);
00165       }
00166 
00167     }
00168 };
